title: See pictures of Gareth Gates starring in Footloose: The Musical as Willard - Showbiz
text: Gareth Gates was recently announced to star in Footloose: The Musical - and now we have a first glimpse of the singer in the production.The former Pop Idol finalist stars as Willard, who was played by Chris Penn in the original movie: © David Ellis © David Ellis © David Ellis Footloose: The Musical will begin touring the UK in January 2016 - with Gates on board until April 16. He will then return to the show from June 20.Based on the 1984 film starring Kevin Bacon, the production tells the story of city boy Ren, who has to move to a rural backwater in America where dancing is banned.Adapted for the stage by Dean Pitchford and Walter Bobbie, it will feature classic '80s hits including 'Holding Out for a Hero', 'Almost Paradise', 'Let's Hear It for the Boy' and 'Footloose'.Footloose received a big-screen remake in 2011, directed by Craig Brewer and starring Kenny Wormald as Ren, Julianne Hough as Ariel and Fantastic Four star Miles Teller as Willard.
